c4p.brief: GDG Taipei，台北 Google 開發者社群
c4p.content: 從 Googler、合作夥伴以及社群講者們瞭解最新技術資訊，我們會在此不定期加入講者的相關資訊，歡迎您在此持續關注我們的訊息。
c4p.title: GDG Taipei，台北 Google 開發者社群

Codelab.content:
Android

Android Things

Cloud

Assistant
Codelab.title: GDG DevFest Taipei 2018 Codelab

logos.name: TADSG 台灣 Android 開發者讀書會
一起工作科技有限公司 (Meet.Jobs)

101.description: This session will cover latest update of Material Design, Material Components, and UI/UX Design flows to build high quality apps.
101.title: Material Design Update

103.description: 科技始終來自於惰性，是「人」才會有惰性啊！能用上最新技術的產品當然令開發者興奮，但人們是否喜愛這項產品、對它有什麼樣的印象就很難說了...
103.title: 科技不是問題唯一解法，請先解決「人」

104.description:
1. A brief introduction of Clean Architecture, what is boundary? usecase? dependency direction?
2. How to implement it on mobile application? I will show you what will it looks like.
3. Discussion about threading, layering, packaging and modulization.
104.title: Mobile Clean Architecture

105.description:
如果你有如下的疑問，那麼可能在這個議程裡，你將可以更進一步獲得了解這些問題的本質
* 與PM或是非技術人員溝通需求有困難？

什麼是行為趨動開發(BDD)、什麼是實例化需求(SBE)
* 書上寫的單元測試，看起來都很簡單，但實務上又下不了手

什麼是測試趨動開發(TDD)
* Coverage 100% 是不是代表程式品質很好？

談測試的品質
* 誰來寫 UI Test ?

工程師 --- Android UI Testing
QA --- Appium、calabash

* 有沒有不會寫程式 又不懂 Android Studio 的人用的UI測試程式？
用桌機程式做一個測試機器人吧
105.title: Test Journey-  by Mouth, by Code, by Hands and By Automation Tool

106.description:
持續性整合與發佈 (Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery) 是 DevOps 文化中重要的一環。持續性整合(CI)可以讓軟體每一次變動可以持續、自動的進行驗証(Build、Test、Source Coce Analytics etcs.)。當驗証完全且成功時，可以進一步的整合到自動化發佈/部署(CD)(Docker Images、kubernetes、artfacts etcs.)

在 2018 全球 DevOps 現況調查報告中觀察到軟體交付的效能已經成為公司竟爭優勢的條件之一。持續性整合與發佈 (Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery) 已經成為軟體開發人員必備的技能之一

Google Cloud Build (前身為 Container Build) 基於 Google Cloud Platfrom 提出了一套 CI/CD 的工具，讓開發者可以靈活的持續建構、測試和部署。本次的講提內容將帶你了解 Google Cloud Build 的基本操作方式
106.title: Cloud Build 101

107.description: Cloud不就應該要這麼用！本次以介紹基於Google Kubernetes Engine的開發與自動化CICD流程、Log的管理與進階監控，讓您一次了解開發流程中的Google Cloud各項服務，輕鬆上雲端！
107.title: Google Cloud Platform從開發到管理

108.description: Many abusing cases shorten game product life. To prevent this, Netmarble had made some kind of rule based detection system. However the detection system could not detect changes from update. It requires huge resources to fix it on every update events. To work more efficiently, Netmarble decided replacing rule based detection system to ML based detection system. Let us introduce our new system.
108.title: Game Anomaly Detection Using Tensorflow on GCP ML Engine

109.description: 這幾年前端框架的興起，讓所有人陷入挑選前端框架的選擇障礙。本次演說將為大家帶來 Angular 框架的各種完美的開發體驗，告訴大家如何透過 Angular 快速掌握複雜的前端世界。
109.title: 完美的 Angular 7 前端開發體驗

110.description:
1. New features as module
2. The benefit
3. Examples
110.title: Module base Android Development

111.description: This talk demonstrate that how cloud services empowered data scientists with a production-ready environment to use their familiar tools to deal with such enriched information provided by OSM. (temp)
111.title: Cloud Empowered Geographical Insights with R (temp)

112.description:
* Why push notification
* 使用技術介紹- service worker & redis & firebase
* 網站內被動推播(passive notification)
* 網站外主動推播(active notification)
1) APP 推播
2) Mobile Web推播
3) Desktop 播播
* 推播後台系統整合
* Demo
* Q&A
112.title: A push notification system integrated with service worker, firebase cloud message and redis

113.description:
1. Why we need micro service?
2. What is micro service and how GCP can help us?
3. How we manage our micro-service with G8?
4. How we build common protocol with G8?
5. Future work
113.title: Build your own PAAS like Micro-Service on GKE.

114.description:
1.what is google home ; what can it do, what can it change your life.
2.introduce diagdflow and firebase
3.live coding
114.title: develop the Google Home Voice App with diagflow and firebase

115.description:
是的，我們做了一款七龍珠中的戰鬥力探測器，透過人臉辨識，探測工程師的開源貢獻力。本次演講內容有:
1. 初心者的人臉辨識技術 ，Face Recognition API
2. 使用 Golang 在 Github 上做 Data Mining
3. 從零開始的 side project，開發心路歷程與收穫分享

內容包含 Face Recognition API，Github Data Mining，難度入門，適合沒有經驗但想上手人臉辨識的人。
115.title: 從零開始的人臉辨識，七龍珠戰鬥力探測器

116.description:
One of my favourite things about the web are ASCII smileys. They're sweet, fun and simply make the web a better place. How could anyone not like them ¯(ツ)/¯?

This talk is an overdose of smileys, because they're the perfect excuse to get started with Polymer. Polymer is a library built on top of the Web Components standards that helps developers create reusable components for the modern web. And since I know that everybody has been wondering how one could take over the world by creating a suite of Polymer animated emoticon components, we're going to do exactly that.
116.title: On Polymer and smileys... or Polysmileys

117.description: 本議程將分享如何實作 Kubernetes Bare metal Load Balancer，由於目前 Kubernetes Service Load Balancer 類型大多只有在公有雲平台上才會支援，但若要在公司建立一套 Kubernetes 來使用，且又需要支援 Kubernetes Service Load Balancer 的話，我們該怎麼辦呢？來聽本次議程就對了!!我將會分享以 IPVS 與自行研發的 Kubernetes Operator 來實現其功能。
117.title: 自幹 IPVS-based 的 Kubernetes Bare metal Load Balancer

118.description:
-A glance at Detection AI as it stands today, it’s potential, and how it can evolve and impact the future.
-Personal anecdote about my first experience with Detection AI
-A few quick demos of simple A.I. detection, as well as a walkthrough detailing how easy it can be for any of the people attending this meet-up utilize the same technology (using Google Vision).
118.title: Detection A.I

120.title: 如何使用 Dialogflow 製作你自己的聊天機器人

121.description: Using service workers and other modern progressive web apps capabilities we can update our web applications to be offline-fires. In this session we'll show how to easily convert your applications be usable without the internet connection.
121.title: Offline-first progressive web apps

122.description: 對大型軟體來說，良好的架構可以讓你寫出更好維護的程式碼。Dagger 是由 Android 大神 Jake wharton 所開發的 dependency injection framework，本場次將帶你從基礎入門如何使用並分析其背後精神 / 原理等深入探討。
122.title: Dependency Injection: koin vs dagger

123.description: 在本次演講中，會跟大家分享如何透過 Golang 撰寫 Kubernetes 相關的應用程式，透過該應用程式我們能夠更直接且直覺地去控管整個 Kubernetes 叢集並且自行實現一個更有彈性的 Container as a Serivce 平台。除了開發之外，也會跟大家分享要如何透過常見的 CI/CD 工具來幫自行實現的 CaaS 平台進行測試與部屬。
123.title: 手把手打造自己的 CaaS (Container As a Service) Platform

124.description:
Mobile Apps 的發展訊速，但作為配套的Google Analytics一直被認為只是對網頁量身訂造。這節會探討Mobile Apps開發中又如何善用Google 提供的各種分析工具，從而確定開發方向，加速開發進度。
﹝此節會配合中/英雙語進行，適合對GA已有認識的聽眾﹞
124.title: Google Analytics for Mobile Apps

126.description: 今年參考了日本東京 DevFest，準備了一個 Android 講壇，邀請了 KKBOX 的 William、PicCollage 的 Prada、誠實蜜蜂的 Alex，還有喜歡隱瞞身份的 Cuber 到台上來聊聊近期 Android JetPack、AndroidX、各種開發工具、Library 的各種拼裝使用狀況與優缺點，我們同時也將開放一段時間讓台下質詢台上四位各種敏感的 Android 問題。
126.title: Android 開發大亂鬥

127.description: Google Play just required all its Apps to target API 26 since November 1st. I'll talk about all these new requirements and a library I've open sourced to help fix one of the biggest part of the behavior change -- run-time permissions. I might also cover what checks we can do to assure our Apps don't break in new behaviors if we have enough time for this.
127.title: Android Permission Handler to meet the Google Play App Guidelines

146.description: Afterparty is a great time to have some fun and meet new people
146.title: Afterparty & Networking

147.description: 請確認是否有遺漏物品，請在離開前將識別證帶還給工作人員，Badge 可留作紀念。
147.title: 閉幕

takuo_suzuki.name: Takuo Suzuki / 鈴木拓生
takuo_suzuki.shortBio: 曾為使用者介面設計師的 Takuo Suzuki 鈴木拓生先生現為 Google 在亞洲地區的開發者社群地區經理...
takuo_suzuki.bio: 曾為使用者介面設計師的 Takuo Suzuki 鈴木拓生先生現為 Google 在亞洲地區的開發者社群地區經理，他除了在 Google 的 Material Design 實感設計方面有深入經驗之外，在使用者經驗及相關領域中亦有多年經驗。
takuo_suzuki.title: Developer Relation, Reginal Lead

charlie_tsai.bio: 前讀書會 co-organizer, 現 Google 工程師, 負責 Android Studio 的開發與維護
charlie_tsai.name: Charlie Tsai
charlie_tsai.shortBio: 前讀書會co-organizer, 現 Google 工程師, 負責 Android Studio 的開發與維護
charlie_tsai.title: Software Engineer

akane_lee.bio: 如果設計師能和工程師順利合作，那麼老公也就能準時下班了吧。因此努力推廣 UI/UX 設計方面的知識、技術，並分享自己在專案開發上踩過的各種坑與心得。
akane_lee.name: Akane Lee
akane_lee.shortBio: 嫁給 RD 的 UI Designer
akane_lee.title: UI / UX

YanBin.bio: 有潔癖的 Android 工程師，喜歡分享，不定時出現在社群的各個活動。
YanBin.name: 彥彬
YanBin.shortBio: Android, Unit test, OOP, kotlin, Architecture
YanBin.title: Android

cage.bio: Google Developer Cloud Expert, GCPUG Taipei organizer
cage.name: Cage Chung
cage.title: Senior Engineer

simon_su.bio: Simon Su，熱衷於雲端、系統、大資料相關之建置與研究，曾帶領台灣公有雲開發團隊建立第一朵台灣的公有雲，並且為Google Cloud認證之亞洲地區講師，具備 20+ 場的Google雲端課程授課經驗，也榮獲Google Developer Expert(GDE)的頭銜，為全球200多位GDE之一。另外，Simon為台灣Google Cloud社群創辦人，在業界有著豐富的數據工程教學與演講經驗，著有：Google Cloud雲端平台實作手冊一書。
simon_su.name: Simon Su
simon_su.shortBio: Simon Su，熱衷於雲端、系統、大資料相關之建置與研究，曾帶領台灣公有雲開發團隊建立第一朵台灣的公有雲，並且為Google Cloud認證之亞洲地區講師，具備 20+ 場的Google雲端課程授課經驗，也榮獲Google Developer Expert(GDE)的頭銜，為全球200多位GDE之一。另外，Simon為台灣Google Cloud社群創辦人，在業界有著豐富的數據工程教學與演講經驗，著有：Google Cloud雲端平台實作手冊一書。
simon_su.title: DevOps PE

yong_lee.bio: I belong to GDG Cloud Organizer in S.Korea. I am working in Netmarble and creating many ML products with JI YEON. We are here to share our experiences and know-hows. For those of you who are considering adopt ML in your company, I hope this session would be helpful to you.
yong_lee.name: YONG LEE
yong_lee.title: GDG Cloud Organizer & Team Leader

jenniefer_oh.bio: I belong to GDG Cloud Organizer in S.Korea. I am working in Netmarble and creating many ML products with JI YEON. We are here to share our experiences and know-hows. For those of you who are considering adopt ML in your company, I hope this session would be helpful to you.
jenniefer_oh.name: JENNIFER OH
jenniefer_oh.title: GDG Cloud Organizer & Team Leader

will_huang.bio: 現任多奇數位創意有限公司技術總監。2018 年榮獲 Angular/Web GDE (Google Developer Expert) 開發專家。連續 11 度當選微軟最有價值專家 (Visual Studio and Development Technologies​)。熟悉 Web 開發技術、網站效能調校、許多 .NET/C# 開發技術、SQL Server 資料庫開發、網站內容管理系統、Docker 與 Kubernetes。曾擔任 Visual Studio 2010 上市發表會講師、MSDN 講座講師、TechDays Taiwan 2010~2015 講師、TechEd China 2011, 2013 講師，出版著作有 ASP.NET MVC 2 開發實戰、Windows Phone 開發實戰、ASP.NET MVC 4 開發實戰等書籍。2013​ 年曾獲選第 6 屆iT邦幫忙鐵人賽年度大獎與開發技術組年度鐵人​。部落格: https://blog.miniasp.com/ 粉絲團: https://www.facebook.com/will.fans
will_huang.company: 多奇數位創意有限公司
will_huang.name: Will 保哥
will_huang.shortBio: 現任「多奇數位創意有限公司」技術總監。2018 年榮獲 Angular/Web GDE (Google Developer Expert) 開發專家。連續 11 度當選微軟最有價值專家(MVP)。熟悉 .NET、ASP.NET MVC 與 Angular 相關開發技術。部落格: https://blog.miniasp.com/ 粉絲團: https://www.facebook.com/will.fans
will_huang.title: 技術總監

summit_suen.bio:
1. End-to-end data pipeline/product building experience
2. Problem solver and hacker
3. With a strong background in mathematics and statistics, Summit currently works as a senior data scientist developing data products such as DMP. He is also an open source enthusiast actively connecting and helping local communities, awarded the Data Platform Microsoft Most Valuable Professionals since 2017.
summit_suen.name: Summit Suen
summit_suen.title: Data Scientist

ivan.bio: 現任東森得易購科技中心的前端部門經理。曾經在各大公司先後擔任過介面工程師、系統工程師、專案經理、產品經理、Scrum Master等歷練。目前專注於帶領團隊與前端技術的開發、創新、與導入。對於多媒體融合、跨領域職能協同合作有相當豐富的經驗，自許為團隊的心靈導師，為年輕的工程師注入希望並指引方向。今年獲選為modern web 2018年講師之一，期望在技術領域上為台灣貢獻與分享所學。https://modernweb.tw/
ivan.company: 東森得易購股份有限公司
ivan.name: Ivan Chiou 邱文淇
ivan.shortBio: 現任東森得易購科技中心的前端部門經理。曾經在各大公司先後擔任過介面工程師、系統工程師、專案經理、產品經理、Scrum Master等歷練。目前專注於帶領團隊與前端技術的開發、創新、與導入。對於多媒體融合、跨領域職能協同合作有相當豐富的經驗，自許為團隊的心靈導師，為年輕的工程師注入希望並指引方向。今年獲選為modern web 2018年講師之一，期望在技術領域上為台灣貢獻與分享所學。https://modernweb.tw/
ivan.title: 經理

badges.description: Google Cloud Platform Google Developer Expert
badges.name: gde

david_chen.bio: 集雅科技的CEO，GCPUG共同創辦人，2014, 2015 PyCon APAC 組長，喜歡寫code, 吃拉麵, 滑雪．平常主要進行 Google Platform 上面的 Python 程式開發．
david_chen.name: David Chen
david_chen.title: CEO

wolke_lin.name: Wolke Lin
wolke_lin.shortBio: node.js frontend backend database 台灣在地第一彈！直擊 LINE 開發者小聚 LINE DEVELOPER MEETUP TAIWAN https://www.inside.com.tw/2018/05/03/line-developer-meetup-taiwan-no-1

david_chang.bio: David Chang，DevOps 與後端工程師，Kubernetes Admin。投入  Kubernetes  開發與技術推廣，常出現於 SDN x Cloud Native Meetup 與 Golang Taipei。Golang Taipei 的 co-organizer。
david_chang.name: David Chang
david_chang.shortBio: David Chang，DevOps 與後端工程師，Kubernetes Admin。
david_chang.title: DevOps

kairen.bio: 目前在公司擔任軟體工程師的研發替代役，主要負責 OpenStack、Kubernetes 與 Ceph 等開源技術整合開發，其中更是 OpenStack 與 Kubernetes 社區的程式碼貢獻者，自己也喜歡在技術社群分享開源專案的使用與開發經驗。另外過去也曾接觸過 Hadoop、Spark 與 iOS App 等開發。
kairen.name: 白凱仁
kairen.shortBio: 一個喜歡開源技術的蒼藍星，對於 Kubernetes、OpenStack 等開源專案的相關應用、開發與部屬有一些小小心得。
kairen.title: 軟體工程師

david_chang_gcpug.bio: Born in Taiwan, grew up in America. I have a keen interest in solving problems and viewing things in new perspectives. Hope to improve lives one project at a time.
david_chang_gcpug.name: David Chang
david_chang_gcpug.shortBio: IT Consultant, Full Stack Developer, CTO
david_chang_gcpug.title: CTO / Co-founder

lyon.bio: 目前在friDay影音當任Android 工程師，使用Java語言開發。
lyon.name: 里盎
lyon.title: 工程師

kevin_chiu.bio: Kevin 目前任職於遠傳電信行動應用開發小組，之前為手機廠工程師，歡迎對軟硬體整合有興趣的朋友與他一起討論。
kevin_chiu.name: Kevin Chiu
kevin_chiu.title: 資深工程師

jintin.bio: Android / iOS 開發者，熱衷於手機 APP 開發的相關技術，工作之餘喜歡寫一些 open source 小工具幫助自己也幫助他人。
jintin.name: Jintin
jintin.shortBio: Android / iOS 開發者，熱衷於手機 APP 開發的相關技術，工作之餘喜歡寫一些 open source 小工具幫助自己也幫助他人。
jintin.title: 資深工程師

hwchiu.bio: 一位被 Programming 耽誤的 DevOps Engineer，從 C/C++ 開發家用路由器到後來轉用 Golang 開發程式，最後一頭栽進 Kubernetes 內的世界。目前於 ThunderToken 就任 DevOps 工程師，同時也是 SDNDS-TW 以及 CNTUG 兩個台灣社群的共同創辦人。本身對於 Networking 的概念非常有興趣，喜歡去學習與研究各式各樣的網路概念，特別是從 2008 年開始談起的 SDN(Software Defined Networking). 此外也喜歡透過閱讀原始碼的方式來學習這些網路概念是如何在系統上實現的，特別是 Linux Kernel 相關的實現方式。閒暇之餘也會寫部落格，將所學所知分享出去並且參加社群與大家交流討論來學習。
hwchiu.name: 邱宏瑋(hwchiu)
hwchiu.title: DevOps Engineer

peter_lo.bio: Peter 是 GDG 香港區組織者，現時在初創公司擔任行政總裁並在香港中文大學專業進修學院擔任講師教授市場學相關課程。在他的職業生涯中，Peter曾在影像串流產業中擔任研究開發，期後投身香港最大的報業公司，製作了第一批免費新聞手機應用。近年專注於內地市場，徙事數據分析及數位行銷方面。
peter_lo.name: Peter Lo
peter_lo.shortBio: 行政總裁 - 睿創市場策劃, 講師 - 香港中文大學專業進修學院
peter_lo.title: CG Marketing

mTwTm.bio: mTwTm currently works as a Senior Software Engineer at Mozilla. He has dedicated his time on Android since his first job. He is usually interested in optimizing Android background behaviors, building with Gradle and apk size optimization. He is recently mainly contributing to Firefox Rocket, a Webview based browser. He is, also, an Open Source believer. He currently writes everything in Java but he also dreams to learn more about Kotlin.
mTwTm.name: mTwTm

He is, also, an Open Source believer. He currently writes everything in Java but he also dreams to learn more about Kotlin.

ted_chien.bio: Ted 現任 GDG Taipei - 台北 Google 開發者社群 主辦人，同時也是 遠傳電信 個人消費性產品事業部 數位技術處 App 開發小組 技術副理 以及 台灣維基媒體協會 監事；曾在 友立資訊、宏達電子 等公司擔任過 資深工程師、程式經理 等職，並曾任 台灣維基媒體協會 理事長，經歷過多項 Android、iOS 及 Windows 等平台上的軟體開發與測試專案，期望以自己的小小貢獻幫助更多開發者朋友們在技術學習之路上更平順。
ted_chien.name: Ted Chien
ted_chien.shortBio: Ted 的專長領域為 Android / iOS / Windows 上的 App 開發與測試專案管理，以及技術社群經營。

ihor_dvoretskyi.bio:
Ihor serves as a Developer Advocate with Kubernetes specialization for Cloud Native Computing Foundation - the Linux Foundation project, focused on creating and driving the adoption of a new computing paradigm that is optimized for modern distributed systems environments.

Ihor holds the role of Product Manager for Kubernetes at Kubernetes Open Source Community, co-driving Product Management Special Interest Group; and Program Manager at Mirantis - company, which is offering Kubernetes-based commercial solutions and services.

Apart from the product management activities, Ihor acts as a OpenStack Special Interest group co-lead at Kubernetes Community, working intensely on the questions and abilities, related to OpenStack and Kubernetes collaboration and integration.

Prior to Mirantis, Ihor has been responsible for the projects, tightly bound to Cloud computing area, containerized workloads and Linux systems.
ihor_dvoretskyi.name: Ihor Dvoretskyi

2015.title: The Cloud Convergence: OpenStack and Kubernetes

2016.title: Application Delivery with OpenStack and Kubernetes

2017.title: Welcome to the world of Open Source. Stories by Kubernetes contributor

ihor_dvoretskyi.title: Developer Advocate

He has 10+ years of experience in web development and has switched from PHP world. He is focusing on performance, quality, and automation. He likes to optimize solutions, make them simpler, faster and stable. In his time at SoftServe, he has worked with the Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, GraphQL, and many other technologies.

2017.title: Programming languages as religions or instruments?

Mateusz works as an Android Developer at IG, where he uses his Android-abracadabras to make enterprise software users more productive.

He's also an active member of GDG Kraków where, together with his co-organisers, he ensures the local community has direct access to the latest trends and knowledge of Google-related technology.

Mateusz is an avid Android speaker, and is particularly keen to get involved in events focusing on coding Android.

At Stanfy he is working on a customized Android OS for in-room tablets installed at hotels by KEYPR.

He has more than 10 applications successfully published on Google Play. Former GDG chapter lead in Nikolaev. Currently he is leading a team that builds broker software for 60+ different brokers.

shmuela_jacobs.bio: Shmuela Jacobs is a front-end developer, consultant, speaker, and community activist. She is the founder of ngGirls and Angular Nights meetup group. During her academic studies (M.Sc. in Information Management Engineering and B.Sc. in Physics) Shmuela had combined her passions of coding and teaching as a software developer, teaching assistant, science museum guide, and researcher. Today she continues to enjoy these activities developing with Angular and sharing her knowledge and experience in meetups and conferences. Shmuela lives in Tel Aviv with her husband Haggai, their deaf dog Ziggi, and one-eyed cat Franco.
shmuela_jacobs.name: Shmuela Jacobs

2017.title: Web goes Native: Progressive Web Apps with Angular

shmuela_jacobs.title: Founder

valentyn_shybanov.bio: Started software engineering career with low level system programming mostly on start of the era of modern computers, my interest involved from programming calculators and simple games to developing complex enterprise-level cloud-based solutions. Now, with help of modern technologies, solutions and concepts, I am not just trying to bring any, even most courageous ideas into life, but also spread the light of all brilliant technology solutions I can find to all other developers. Now focused on combination of Web technologies (Angular, Dart) and cloud platforms (Google Cloud Platform, Amazon EC2, Azure etc) and mobile (Flutter)
valentyn_shybanov.name: Valentyn Shybanov

2014.title: Go in the Cloud: How using Go can help building cloud ready applications

vitaliy_zasadnyy.bio: Vitaliy is a mobile developer, public speaker and community manager. He is eager about product perfection and scalability. Goes crazy about new IoT devices and Google products. Originally Vitaliy is from Ukraine, where he founded GDG Lviv. Now he is leading mobile department at GetSocial, startup based in The Netherlands. GetSocial is building the cloud-based mobile engagement platform that empowers any app developer with tools to maximise user acquisition, engagement, retention and monetization.
vitaliy_zasadnyy.name: Vitaliy Zasadnyy

2016.title: J2ObjC. Cross platform development - Google way

vitaliy_zasadnyy.title: Head of Mobile

yonatan_levin.bio:
A born entrepreneur, combining the creative imagination of an artist with the meticulous precision of an engineer, Yonatan Levin is not only one of Israel’s top mobile developers, he’s also a member of the elite worldwide group of Google Developers Experts.

And while Yonatan’s primary expertise is in Mobile and Product Management, he also gets along extremely well with backend technologies — not to mention people in general.

At Gett Yonatan headed up Android development, helping make it the world’s largest on-demand transportation, delivery, and logistics company. Most recently, Yonatan has received funding for his thirds (and latest) startup, KolGene, which is already revolutionizing the field of genetic testing.

In his free time, Yonatan can often be found, like his Star Wars hero Luke Skywalker, saving the galaxy, one groundbreaking technology at a time.
yonatan_levin.name: Yonatan Levin

2017.title: Architecture Components. The one that got away
Making mistakes and building products from 1st to 30M users

yonatan_levin.title: CTO & Co-Founder

yuliya_kaleda.bio: Yuliya is an Android developer, leading a team of 4 developers at Jet.com. Her main focus  is to build performant, scalable, cutting-edge Android projects. Her most recent cutting-edge project was the first multi-feature Instant Apps, which was a huge success and got featured on Google Android Developer website (https://developer.android.com/stories/instant-apps/jet.html#results). She volunteers at C4Q - non-profit organization, the main focus of which is to foster the tech community in NY. She also volunteers in teaching Android Development at Access Code Program, which targets underrepresented minorities, women and immigrants.
yuliya_kaleda.name: Yuliya Kaleda

2017.title: Make Your App Instant!

yuliya_kaleda.title: Senior Android Developer
